item.title: The Fed’s once oh-so-certain cuts for the rest of 2025 are already fading into oblivion
item.description: U.S. economic data keeps coming back stronger than expected, and frankly it's raining on the parade for markets.

item.title: When your VC is your CEO
item.description: Arjun Sethi become co-CEO of crypto currency exchange Kraken last fall. He's also the Chairman of Tribe Capital, one of the company's backers.

item.title: TikTok’s $14 billion price tag in Trump deal stuns investors
item.description: The rough estimate, cited by Vice President JD Vance on Thursday, is well below previous projections that scaled closer to $40 billion.

item.title: Under the radar, CEOs have growing concerns about U.S. commitment to free speech, science, and rule of law
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: MasterClass CEO admits it’s ‘really tough’ for Gen Z grads—he reveals how they can get hiring managers to respond to cold emails
item.description: AI may be gutting entry-level opportunities, but MasterClass CEO David Rogier argues it’s also Gen Z’s biggest shot to stand out—if they know how to u...
